title: Yeshiva Students Lose Benefits
body: Israeli bochurim in yeshivos who haven't enlisted in the IDF will lose National Insurance benefits starting January 1, 2026, following a Supreme Court order.

title: Yerushalayim Protests Bochurim Arrests
body: Yerushalayim erupts in unrest as hundreds protest the arrest of yeshiva bochurim classified as draft evaders due to unresolved ben yeshiva status, with demonstrators blocking traffic and setting fires.
